amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for salaries and expenses of the Office of Policy Development and Research by $115,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the salaries and expenses account for the Office of Policy Development and Research by $115,000, and apply the savings to the deficit reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 229 (Roll no. 427).
